site.name: Adalo

children.name: App Editing Backend
children.description: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.
children.descriptionHtml: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

children.name: App Editor
children.description: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.
children.descriptionHtml: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

children.name: App Previewer
children.description: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.
children.descriptionHtml: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

children.name: iOS
children.description: The iOS build server manages the work to package and send your app to Testflight. If this is down, iOS builds may not complete.

children.name: Android
children.description: The Android build server packages your app into an .apk or .aab file so that it can be uploaded directly to the Google Play Store. If this is down Android builds may not complete.

children.name: Stripe
children.description: All Stripe transactions and payments operate through this service. If this is down, Stripe payments may not work in your app.

children.name: Maps
children.description: This service provides the Additional services needed for the Google Maps component to function. If this is down, it may affect pins showing on your maps.

children.name: Notifications
children.description: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.
children.descriptionHtml: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

children.name: Collections
children.description: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.
children.descriptionHtml: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

components.name: App Analytics
components.description: This provides all the data you see in the analytics panel inside the editor. If this is down you won't see any analytics data for your apps.

components.name: Collections API
components.description: This service handles all of your requests to the Collections API. If this is down, your requests to this API will fail.

notices.name: iOS & Android New Builds Showing White Screen

nameTranslation.text_en: iOS & Android New Builds Showing White Screen
nameTranslation.text_es: Nuevas compilaciones de iOS y Android que muestran una pantalla blanca
nameTranslation.text_ru: Новые сборки iOS и Android показывают белый экран
nameTranslation.text_zh: iOS 和 Android 新版本显示白屏

updates.message: Hey guys, great news! The issue with the iOS and Android builds has been resolved. Please publish a new build to see the changes take effect. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the issue and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it.
updates.messageHtml: Hey guys, great news! The issue with the iOS and Android builds has been resolved. Please publish a new build to see the changes take effect. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the issue and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it.

messageHtmlTranslation.text_en: Hey guys, great news! The issue with the iOS and Android builds has been resolved. Please publish a new build to see the changes take effect. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the issue and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_es: ¡Hola chicos, buenas noticias! El problema con las compilaciones de iOS y Android se ha resuelto. Publique una nueva compilación para que los cambios surtan efecto. Pedimos disculpas por las molestias causadas por el problema y le agradecemos su paciencia mientras trabajábamos para resolverlo.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_ru: Эй, ребята, отличные новости! Проблема со сборками iOS и Android решена. Пожалуйста, опубликуйте новую сборку, чтобы изменения вступили в силу. Приносим извинения за неудобства, вызванные этой проблемой, и благодарим вас за терпение, пока мы работали над ее решением.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_zh: 嘿伙计们，好消息！ iOS 和 Android 版本的问题已得到解决。请发布新版本以查看更改生效。对于该问题给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意，并感谢您在我们努力解决该问题期间的耐心等待。

messageTranslation.text_en: Hey guys, great news! The issue with the iOS and Android builds has been resolved. Please publish a new build to see the changes take effect. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the issue and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it.
messageTranslation.text_es: ¡Hola chicos, buenas noticias! El problema con las compilaciones de iOS y Android se ha resuelto. Publique una nueva compilación para que los cambios surtan efecto. Pedimos disculpas por las molestias causadas por el problema y le agradecemos su paciencia mientras trabajábamos para resolverlo.
messageTranslation.text_ru: Эй, ребята, отличные новости! Проблема со сборками iOS и Android решена. Пожалуйста, опубликуйте новую сборку, чтобы изменения вступили в силу. Приносим извинения за неудобства, вызванные этой проблемой, и благодарим вас за терпение, пока мы работали над ее решением.
messageTranslation.text_zh: 嘿伙计们，好消息！ iOS 和 Android 版本的问题已得到解决。请发布新版本以查看更改生效。对于该问题给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意，并感谢您在我们努力解决该问题期间的耐心等待。

updates.message: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing both new iOS and Android builds to show a white screen on launch. Our team is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.
updates.messageHtml: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing both new iOS and Android builds to show a white screen on launch. Our team is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.

messageHtmlTranslation.text_en: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing both new iOS and Android builds to show a white screen on launch. Our team is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_es: Actualmente estamos experimentando una interrupción, lo que está provocando que las nuevas compilaciones de iOS y Android muestren una pantalla blanca al iniciarse. Nuestro equipo es consciente del problema y está trabajando para resolverlo lo antes posible. Pedimos disculpas por las molestias y proporcionaremos actualizaciones a medida que estén disponibles.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_ru: В настоящее время мы наблюдаем сбой, из-за которого новые сборки iOS и Android отображают белый экран при запуске. Наша команда знает о проблеме и работает над ее устранением как можно скорее. Приносим извинения за неудобства и будем предоставлять обновления по мере их появления.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_zh: 我们目前遇到了一次中断，这导致新的 iOS 和 Android 版本在启动时显示白屏。我们的团队已意识到该问题，并正在努力尽快解决。对于给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意，并将在有更新时提供更新。

messageTranslation.text_en: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing both new iOS and Android builds to show a white screen on launch. Our team is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.
messageTranslation.text_es: Actualmente estamos experimentando una interrupción, lo que está provocando que las nuevas compilaciones de iOS y Android muestren una pantalla blanca al iniciarse. Nuestro equipo es consciente del problema y está trabajando para resolverlo lo antes posible. Pedimos disculpas por las molestias y proporcionaremos actualizaciones a medida que estén disponibles.
messageTranslation.text_ru: В настоящее время мы наблюдаем сбой, из-за которого новые сборки iOS и Android отображают белый экран при запуске. Наша команда знает о проблеме и работает над ее устранением как можно скорее. Приносим извинения за неудобства и будем предоставлять обновления по мере их появления.
messageTranslation.text_zh: 我们目前遇到了一次中断，这导致新的 iOS 和 Android 版本在启动时显示白屏。我们的团队已意识到该问题，并正在努力尽快解决。对于给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意，并将在有更新时提供更新。
